DOC.brief_summary: Antibiotics in patients with acute respiratory tract infections in primary care in consideration of procalcitonin as additive parameter. The purpose of this study is to compare the ordinary manner of antibiotic- prescription with the prescription in consideration of procalcitonin-value in patients with acute respiratory tract infections.
DOC.brief_title: Antibiotics in Patients With Acute Respiratory Tract Infection With Procalcitonin as Parameter
